title: STAT+: New rule would force PBMs to disclose drug rebates and other fees
description: The proposal would mark a significant change for the secretive PBM industry, which often shields crucial data from its clients.
content: The proposal would mark a significant change for the secretive PBM industry, which often shields crucial data from its clients.
